name: coresystems
description: Leader in cloud and mobile 4 enterprise
overview: coresystems ag, with its head office in Windisch, Switzerland, was founded in 2006. Our coresuite cloud makes us pioneers in mobile business solutions. We develop mobile, flexible and user-friendly apps to support business processes and create real added value. With our intelligent cloud and mobile solutions, you can access local information in the ERP environment of your company from anywhere and use it, bundle it or forward it as needed. Our innovative software solutions are increasing the efficiency of companies around the world, with 100,000+ users benefiting from our products today. Our customers are medium-sized to large national and international companies with highly complex business processes, several branch offices and numerous subsidiaries. We currently have more than 140 employees around the world and 350+ qualified SAP partners. Our company is a certified SAP Gold and Microsoft Gold partner.
